title: Transformations of Functions - domain and range

content.question: ​The function <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> has domain <math alttext="open square brackets negative 2 comma 2 close square brackets"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> and range <math alttext="open square brackets 1 comma 5 close square brackets"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>. The function <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals negative 2 f open parentheses x plus 3 close parentheses plus 4"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></math>. What are the domain and range of <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math> ?

choices.label: ​domain: <math alttext="open square brackets negative 5 comma negative 1 close square brackets"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>, range: <math alttext="open square brackets negative 6 comma 2 close square brackets"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

​​domain: <math alttext="open square brackets negative 5 comma negative 1 close square brackets"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>, range: <math alttext="open square brackets negative 2 comma 6 close square brackets"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

​​domain: <math alttext="open square brackets 1 comma 5 close square brackets"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>, range: <math alttext="open square brackets negative 2 comma 6 close square brackets"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

​​​domain: <math alttext="open square brackets 1 comma 5 close square brackets"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>, range: <math alttext="open square brackets negative 6 comma 2 close square brackets"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

content.answer: ​domain: <math alttext="open square brackets negative 5 comma negative 1 close square brackets"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>, range: <math alttext="open square brackets negative 6 comma 2 close square brackets"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
